item.title: Help adding commands tried need help please!
item.dc:creator: @Mattiaspope Mattiaspope
item.description:
@Mattiaspope wrote:

First Yes i a force chat command. This is on a PI server.

I tried it and it came up with this http://screensnapr.com/v/p1FmWl.png

[quote=“R3minice, post:4, topic:418857”]try this:

if(playerCommand.startsWith("say")) { try { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { String otherPName = String.format(args[1]); String message = String.format(args[2]); String position = null; int otherPIndex = Server.playerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); for (int i = 0; i <Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToBan)) { Client p = (Client) PlayerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.forceChat(message); } else { c.sM("invalid"); } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sM("Idiot, ::say name text"); } } [/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Help adding commands tried need help please!
item.dc:creator: @R3minice R3minice
item.description:
@R3minice wrote:

try this:

if(playerCommand.startsWith("say")) { try { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { String otherPName = String.format(args[1]); String message = String.format(args[2]); String position = null; int otherPIndex = Server.playerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); for (int i = 0; i <Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToBan)) { Client p = (Client) PlayerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.forceChat(message); } else { c.sM("invalid"); } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sM("Idiot, ::say name text"); } }

item.title: Help adding commands tried need help please!

item.description:
@Mattiaspope wrote:

I need help adding a command to make a player say something to be used like this. ::say john hello John being the players name and hell being the text. I’ve given it ago but i need some help.

[code]
if(playerCommand.startsWith(“say”)) {

				for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
				if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
				if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToBan)) {
				Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i];
				p.forcedChat ("")
				
						} 
					}
				}[/code]
